refnamediv.refpurpose: Installing and configuring the HTTP extension

refsect1.title: Installation requirements on Windows
refsect1.para:
In order to be able to load this extension on Windows, you additionally need to to load the following PHP extensions:
hash, incov, SPL.

refsect1.title: Installation requirements on other platforms
refsect1.para: The extension must be built with libcurl support to enable request functionality (--with-http-curl-requests). A library version equal or greater to v7.12.3 is required.

To enable support for sending and receiveing compressed responses, the extension must be built with zlib support (--with-http-zlib-compression). A library version equal or greater than v1.2.2 is required.
Content type quessing can be enabled by building this extension with libmagic support (--with-http-magic-mime).
